author: Robbie Whelan
title: Mexican Mogul Resists Coronavirus Restrictions - The Wall Street Journal
description: Ricardo Salinas Pliego compares Covid-19 lockdowns to jail; his TV network disputes deputy health minister’s advice
content:
MEXICO CITYAs Covid-19 cases and deaths mount across Mexico, the countrys second richest businessman is publicly defying health recommendations meant to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus, sparking a confrontation with the government.
 Ricardo Salinas… [+255 chars]
